FuncDef:
The ospf remote-lfa disable command disables Remote LFA on OSPF interfaces.
The undo ospf remote-lfa disable command enables Remote LFA on OSPF interfaces.
By default, Remote LFA is disabled on all OSPF interfaces unless the remote-lfa command is run.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If the remote-lfa command is run, Remote LFA is enabled on all OSPF interfaces. To disable Remote LFA on OSPF interfaces, run the ospf remote-lfa disable command with corresponding parameter specified.
Precautions
If the remote-lfa command is not run prior to the ospf remote-lfa disable command, the ospf remote-lfa disable command can be run, but its configuration does not take effect on interfaces.
If you run the remote-lfa command when the ospf remote-lfa disable command has been run, Remote LFA is disabled.
